mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.teacherid AS "teacherid", a.des AS "des", a.price AS "price", a.nprice AS "nprice", a.vipprice AS "vipprice", a.timelength AS "timelength", a.days AS "days", a.students AS "students", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.type AS "type"
